Hey guys,
This torrent works but you will have to download Stuffit 8.02 from http://www.stuffit.com/mac-stuffit-download.html
No other file extractors work they will give you another zip file which is just like the original. 
Best Game Ever!
Hoped this helped!
So I went to Lion and can't use stuffit 8.02 any suggestions?
I used an older mac to unstuff. Still not working. I bet it doesn't work on Lion, anyone have success getting it to work on Lion?
Works great on 2012 MacBook Pro, running Mountain Lion. Best to set the resolution in the User.ini file before you start the game.
I should mention, that you need to repackage the CXS wrapper into a CXEx wrapper for it to work in Lion or Mountain Lion.
